title: How to Make a Peanut Butter and Jelly Apple

steps.headline: Scoop a little more of the apple flesh out, leaving the halves intact.
steps.description: Dice the flesh you've scooped out, to a fine consistency.

steps.headline: Mix the diced apple flesh with some jelly and peanut butter.
Return the spread mix to the hollows in the apple halves.
Gather the ingredients.
steps.description:
You'll need:
1 Granny Smith or similar tart apple
Peanut butter
Jelly (your choice of flavor).

steps.headline: Slice the apple into even thick slides.
steps.description: Remove the core from the slices. Discard any pips not yet removed.

steps.headline: Pair off each of the slices.
steps.description: They will form a top and bottom slice to make a "sandwich".

steps.headline: Spread the bottom slices with the peanut butter and jelly.
Add the top apple slice.
steps.description: Repeat until all are used up.

methods.name: Halloween peanut butter jelly apple bites

steps.headline: Gather the ingredients.
steps.description:
You'll need:
Apples
Peanut butter
Jelly
Slivered almonds.

steps.headline: Quarter the apples.
steps.description: Then quarter another quarter out of the middle of each quarter, exposing the apple flesh. This forms a "mouth" shape. Sprinkle lemon juice on the exposed flesh to keep it from browning.

steps.headline: Fill each mouth with either peanut butter or jelly.
steps.description: Do a good mixture of both, for variety.

steps.headline: Insert the slivered almonds across the top and bottom of the apple mouth.
steps.description: These are the teeth of that give the apple mouth its "bite". This part is fiddly but the more you insert, the more skilled you'll get with it.

steps.headline: Arrange on a platter.
steps.description: A whole lot placed together looks festive on the Halloween table.

methods.name: Peanut butter and jelly apple stack

steps.headline: Gather the ingredients.
steps.description:
You'll need:
Apple
Peanut butter
Jelly.

steps.headline: Spread peanut butter on one slice.
Spread jelly on the next slice.
steps.description: Add the next apple slice. Then add peanut butter and repeat until all slices have been stacked one on top of the other.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: You now have a peanut butter and jelly apple stack.

text:
Peanut butter jelly apple halves Choose a nice apple. Give it a clean. Slice the apple into halves. Remove the core and pips. Scoop a little more of the apple flesh out, leaving the halves intact. Dice the flesh you've scooped out, to a fine consistency. Mix the diced apple flesh with some jelly and peanut butter.  Return the spread mix to the hollows in the apple halves.  Serve immediately.  Peanut butter jelly apple slices Gather the ingredients. You'll need:
1 Granny Smith or similar tart apple
Peanut butter
Jelly (your choice of flavor). Slice the apple into even thick slides. Remove the core from the slices. Discard any pips not yet removed. Pair off each of the slices. They will form a top and bottom slice to make a "sandwich". Spread the bottom slices with the peanut butter and jelly.  Add the top apple slice. Repeat until all are used up. Serve immediately.  Halloween peanut butter jelly apple bites Gather the ingredients. You'll need:
Apples
Peanut butter
Jelly
Slivered almonds. Quarter the apples. Then quarter another quarter out of the middle of each quarter, exposing the apple flesh. This forms a "mouth" shape. Sprinkle lemon juice on the exposed flesh to keep it from browning. Fill each mouth with either peanut butter or jelly. Do a good mixture of both, for variety. Insert the slivered almonds across the top and bottom of the apple mouth. These are the teeth of that give the apple mouth its "bite". This part is fiddly but the more you insert, the more skilled you'll get with it. Arrange on a platter. A whole lot placed together looks festive on the Halloween table. Peanut butter and jelly apple stack Gather the ingredients. You'll need:
Apple
Peanut butter
Jelly. Slice the apple evenly. Remove the core and pips. Spread peanut butter on one slice. Add the next apple slice. Spread jelly on the next slice. Add the next apple slice. Then add peanut butter and repeat until all slices have been stacked one on top of the other. Serve. You now have a peanut butter and jelly apple stack.
